issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Support reading timestamp micros
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7743](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7743). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Parquet in Rust doesn't seem to have an easy way to read microsecond precision timestamp columns.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7743?focusedCommentId=17032084) by Chao Sun (csun):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6338
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6338>
